amendment.description: An amendment numbered 8 printed in Part E of House Report 117-381 to set January 1, 2024 as date of applicability for Sec. 262 to allow states time to review and update state law, if desired.
amendment.purpose: Amendment sought to set January 1, 2024, as the date of applicability for Section 262 to allow states time to review and update state law, if desired.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Griffith amendment (A006) Failed by the Yeas and Nays: 180 - 239 (Roll no. 285).

action.text: The previous question was ordered on the amendment (A006) pursuant to the rule.
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Griffith amendment (A006) Failed by the Yeas and Nays: 180 - 239 (Roll no. 285).
Amendment failed by House: On agreeing to the Griffith amendment (A006) Failed by the Yeas and Nays: 180 - 239 (Roll no. 285).
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A006) offered by Mr. Griffith.
